title: Verizon Announces Five New Prepaid Data Plans for Tablets and Hotspots
text:
Verizon Announces Five New Prepaid Data Plans for Tablets and Hotspots 
Published By: Droid-Life.com - Today 
For those in need, Verizon announced five new prepaid data plans today, simplifying its existing plan lineup. The plans range for those inï¿½...
